H0.text: Water + carbon dioxide + energy → sugar + oxygen summarizes the process of respiration.

H1.text: Oxygen + sugar -> carbon dioxide + water + energy is the equation that summarizes the process of respiration.

H2.text: Carbon dioxide + oxygen + water -> sugar + energy is the equation that summarizes the process of respiration.

H3.text: Sugar + carbon dioxide + energy -> oxygen + water is the equation that summarizes the process of respiration.

A4.text: The products of this process are carbon dioxide and water.

A5.text: Aerobic respiration requires oxygen (O2) in order to create ATP.
